A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Is it the best Star Wars Film\, maybe it's my Love of Empire Strikes Back but I'd say no it's not. But I would say it's up there in the top 4 at least. This is not the Star Wars I grew up watching and that is a good thing. Everyone who complained about how Force Awakens was too much like A New Hope should like the fact that this film is not a retread of Empire Strikes Back. I loved this film and will look forward to seeing this film again and again.
